content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, the rental price of the apartment is non-negotiable. I want to rent it out for the highest price possible. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am aiming for the lowest price as stated in my initial facts. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
